ygData.subject: Re: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: Pardon me if someone has already answered this, I just checked my mail for the first time today and am catching up on 55 new messages :/ That little area
ygData.messageBody:
Pardon me if someone has already answered this, I just checked my mail for
the first time today and am catching up on 55 new messages :/

That little area behind teh waterfall in Surefall Glad is NOT so little, and
it's a death trap if you are anything other than a Ranger or Druid. That's
a not so sevret cave where a bunch of bears live and it's where part of the
"poacher" quest for Rangers takes place. My suggestion? Dont go back there
unless you enjoy getting mauled by bears and slaughtered by NPC's for the
heinous crime of getting mauled by bears.


>From: Jennifer Donaldson <cotto004@...>
>
>How about that little area in Surefall Glade where you have to swim
underneath
>some sort of ledge to get to it? I don't have my water breathing song yet,
>and I have been wondering what's back there.
>
>Lanye
